TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripDropDownItemAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem/ToolStripItemAccessibleObject

summary.span: 提供的信息可由辅助功能应用程序用来为残障用户调整 的用户界面。

span.span: Provides information that accessibility applications use to adjust the user interface of a for users with impairments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem item) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DoDefaultAction() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与该辅助性对象相关的默认操作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端可以通过检查对象的检索对象的默认操作属性。Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's property. 客户端可以使用自动化 （如果支持） 而不是执行对象的默认操作。A client can use automation (if supported) instead of to perform an object's default action. 但是，提供轻松执行对象的最常用的操作。However, provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.

para.span: 由系统提供的用户界面元素的默认操作依赖于键盘状态。

span.span: The default action performed by system-provided user interface elements depends on the keyboard state.

para.span: 也就是说，如果修改如 SHIFT 键，alt 键或 CTRL 已关闭 （不管是由用户操作或以编程方式） 时调用时，默认值操作可能不是与这些键不向下相同。

span.span: That is, if a modifier key such as SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL is down (either by a user action or programmatically) when is called, the default action might not be the same as when those keys are not down.

para.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject GetChild(int32 index) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetChild (index As Integer) As AccessibleObject

param.name: index
param.span: 辅助性子控件的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the accessible child control.

summary.span: 检索对应于指定索引的辅助性子控件。

span.span: Retrieves the accessible child control corresponding to the specified index.

returns.span: ，表示对应于指定索引的辅助性子控件。

span.span: An that represents the accessible child control corresponding to the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类来公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自，在使用方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from , is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。Therefore, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码演示如何重写方法。This code demonstrates overriding the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#4)]

returns.span: 属于可访问对象的子级的个数。

span.span: The number of children belonging to an accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类来公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自，在使用方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from , is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。Therefore, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 重写此代码演示方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Role As AccessibleRole
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleRole Role { System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleRole get(); };

summary.span: 获取此辅助性对象的角色。

span.span: Gets the role of this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的角色可帮助描述对象的函数。The role of the object helps describe the function of the object.
